title: Beerfest for Beergeeks
desc: 18 hand selected breweries pouring 2 beers per brewery. All the beers will either be barrel aged, sours, or unique one-offs. These beers will never be seen again or are very hard to find, so don't miss out! Breweries : Allagash-ME, Anderson Valley-CA, Almanac-CA, Sierra Nevada-CA, Hangar 24-CA, El Segundo-CA, Logsdon-OR, Tahoe Mountain-CA, Telegraph-CA, Boulevard-MO, Avery-CO, Modern Times-CA Uinta-NV, Breckenridge-CO, Bom Brewery-Belgium, Artisanal Imports-Belgium, Clown Shoes-MA, Joseph James-NV Tickets are limited, so don't wait! Tickets sold on EventBrite are presale. General Admission Tickets will also be sold at the door.
